answers.answer: It may be due to some common cause, if it just mild and recent. Check your blood pressure and Diabetes status. Check you haemoglobin and also take some multivitamin. If with proper sleep it does not dissapear you have to visit a neurologist to find out the cause. Take care!

question: Some times i feel week in my wrists and my hands shake. It is not enough to stop me from doing anything but i feel it. just wonder if ther is anything i can do?This discussion is related to/posts/show/898491.
title: Why does my hand shake sometimes?
